item.title: Colorado River Deal Doesn't Resolve the West's Water Crisis
item.description: The Colorado River is drying up due to drought and overuse. A recent deal between Arizona, California, and Nevada to reduce water usage is a welcome step, but it is not enough to solve the West’s water crisis. More needs to be done to conserve water and adapt to the changing climate.
